title: Nascent Nikki
description: GraysonNascente. In Italian it means just coming into existence or being birthed. A rising star. No other word defines her better.She's my everything. Best friend. Lover.. Soul mate..It's been my privilege to be by her side on some of the hardest days of her life. Only one thing stands between us and our happily ever after. The man responsible for her worst nightmares. NikkiWhen I was rescued from the pit of hell I thought the worst was over.I was wrong. Some days putting the shattered pieces of my life back together feels impossible.Through it all he's been by my side. My protector. My strength. My love. When my nightmare returns, intent on tearing us apart, will I have healed enough to face it or will I be dragged into the depths forever this time?
author: A.J. Andersen
